field.name: fDivingMaxDistanceToWater
field.desc: Max distance to water to dive

field.name: fDivingMinWaterDepth
field.desc: Min water depth to dive

field.name: fSlideSlopeAngle
field.desc: Slope angle at which the pawn will slide and partially lose control

field.name: fFallingSlopeAngle
field.desc: Slope angle at which the pawn will fall and completely lose control

field.name: fMinSlideFallAccel
field.desc: Acceleration of the pawn towards ground when slide falling at min slide angle

field.name: fMaxSlideFallAccel
field.desc: Acceleration of the pawn towards ground when slide falling at max slide angle

field.name: fSlideFallDecelOnGround
field.desc: Deceleration of sliding speed when not sliding and on ground

field.name: fSlideFallDecelInAir
field.desc: Deceleration of sliding speed when not sliding and in the air

field.name: fMinFallSpeedToSlideSpeedMultiplier
field.desc: Multiplier applied to fall speed to translate into slide speed when landing onto a slope at min sliding angle

field.name: fMaxFallSpeedToSlideSpeedMultiplier
field.desc: Multiplier applied to fall speed to translate into slide speed when landing onto a slope at max sliding angle

field.name: fSlideSpeedToFallSpeedMultiplier
field.desc: Transfer this amount of sliding speed into falling speed when going from slide to fall

field.name: fSlideSpeedToFallSpeedSlowDown
field.desc: Multiplier applied to sliding speed when going from slide to fall

field.name: fMaxSlideFallVelocity
field.desc: Max velocity while slide falling

field.name: fSlideFallVelocityReorientSpeed
field.desc: Speed in radian at which the slide velocity vector reorients itself to the new desired direction

field.name: fSlidingTargetInputContribution
field.desc: Desired input contribution when sliding

field.name: fSlidingInputContributionAccel
field.desc: Speed at which input contribution goes back to normal

field.name: fSlidingInputContributionDecel
field.desc: Speed at which input contribution reduces as we are sliding

field.name: fMinTimeToUpdateSlidingPMS
field.desc: Min frequency (seconds) at which we can update the sliding PMS

field.name: fMinTimeOnGroundToForceUpdateSlidingPMS
field.desc: If pawn on ground for this long, force update sliding PMS

field.name: fMinTimeSlidingToForceSlidingPMS
field.desc: If pawn sliding for this long, force update sliding PMS

field.name: fMinHeightDiffToSlide
field.desc: Pawn will not slide before he travels this vertical distance from the last valid position

field.name: iMinFramesGroundValidToNavigate
field.desc: Min number of frames necessary on valid ground angle to navigate (get out of slope behavior sliding)

field.name: fMinSlopeAngleForFrameValidation
field.desc: The min number of frames only applies if the current ground angle is at least this high

field.name: fAntiStuckMinDisplacement
field.desc: The min displacement over a set period of time to ensure anti-stuck does not trigger

field.name: fAntiStuckMinTime
field.desc: If player has not moved enough for this long while in sliding, anti-stuck triggers!

field.name: fFallDistanceA
field.desc: [Idle or Stumble] 1st distance at which pawn will take MINIMUM damage when falling at least this high

field.name: fFallDistanceB
field.desc: [Crouch or Roll] 2nd distance at which pawn will take damage when falling at least this high

field.name: fFallDistanceC
field.desc: [Crouch or Roll] 3rd distance at which pawn will take damage when falling at least this high

field.name: fFallDistanceD
field.desc: [Death by gravity] 4th distance at which pawn will take MAXIMUM damage when falling at least this high

field.name: fMinHorizontalSpeedToRoll
field.desc: Min Horizontal speed when landing for pawn to perform Roll or Stumble

field.name: fSpecialFallDistanceA
field.desc: [Idle or Stumble] 1st distance at which pawn will take MINIMUM damage when falling at least this high

field.name: fSpecialFallDistanceB
field.desc: [Crouch or Roll] 2nd distance at which pawn will take damage when falling at least this high

field.name: fSpecialFallDistanceC
field.desc: [Crouch or Roll] 3rd distance at which pawn will take damage when falling at least this high

field.name: fSpecialFallDistanceD
field.desc: [Death by gravity] 4th distance at which pawn will take MAXIMUM damage when falling at least this high

field.name: fTimeToGroundForLandingAnim
field.desc: Time(in seconds) before hitting ground at which we must start playing the landing animations

field.name: fTimeToGroundForHolster
field.desc: Time(in seconds) before hitting ground at which we must start holstering weapon

field.name: fStimsOnObjectsRadius
field.desc: Radius that stims will hit objects around the landing position of the pawn.

field.name: fHorizontalSpeedFactor
field.desc: Modifies the sensitivity of movement horizontally when you are falling.

field.name: fHorizontalSpeedAccel
field.desc: Modifies the sensitivity of movement horizontally when you are falling.

field.name: fHorizontalSpeedDecel
field.desc: Modifies the sensitivity of movement horizontally when you are falling.

field.name: fDiveSprintHorizontalSpeedFactor
field.desc: Modifies the sensitivity of movement horizontally when you are falling after a dive sprint.

field.name: fDiveSprintHorizontalSpeedAccel
field.desc: Modifies the sensitivity of movement horizontally when you are falling after a dive sprint.

field.name: fDiveSprintHorizontalSpeedDecel
field.desc: Modifies the sensitivity of movement horizontally when you are falling after a dive sprint.

field.name: fFallTimeNeededToDeployWingsuit
field.desc: Duration from when the feet left the ground before player can deploy Wingsuit (mandatory condition)

field.name: fDistanceNeededToDeployWingsuit
field.desc: Minimum distance to ground needed for the player to be able to deploy Wingsuit (mandatory condition)

field.name: fHSpeedNeededToDeployWingsuit
field.desc: Horizontal Speed needed for the player to be able to deploy Wingsuit (either H or V is needed)

field.name: fVSpeedNeededToDeployWingsuit
field.desc: Vertical Speed needed for the player to be able to deploy Wingsuit (either H or V is needed)

field.name: fDivingDistanceToWaterNeededToDeployWingsuit
field.desc: When diving, minimum distance to water needed

field.name: fFrontRayCastLength
field.desc: Length of raycast in front of player to deploy wingsuit

field.name: fFrontRayCastAngle
field.desc: Angle on pitch of raycast in front of player to deploy wingsuit

field.name: fDiveSprintBufferTime
field.desc: Amount of time for which all conditions must be met to trigger Dive Sprint

field.name: fForwardRaycastLength
field.desc: Distance in front that needs to be clear

field.name: fDownwardRaycastLength
field.desc: Drop distance (after forward distance) that needs to be clear

field.name: fDownwardRaycastAngle
field.desc: Angle of the Drop raycast

field.name: fMaxGroundAngle
field.desc: Maximum angle of ground on which player can Dive Sprint

field.name: fHealthPercentageRemovedAtMaxCrushLevel
field.desc: Amount of time for which all conditions must be met to trigger Dive Sprint

field.name: fMaxHealthRemoved
field.desc: Distance in front that needs to be clear
